title: İmsakiye sadece bir aylık
body: İmsakiye sadece bir aylık gösteriyor. Bir aydan daha ileri tarihli namaz vakitleri 00:00 olarak gözüküyor. Bazen otomatik yenileme yapmıyor. Bir ay boyunca yenileme yapılmazsa saat 00:00 da namaz vakti gibi uyarı veriyor, ezan okuyor. Namaz vakitleri güncellemesini uygulamada neyin tetiklediğini çözemedim. Namaz vakitleri diyanet'ten alındığında oluyor galiba.

The app crash when you, use Manuel city chooser
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
#### Expected behavior
when using the Manuel city choose it is not so-pose to crash. and you are trying to select the new city it crash.

#### Actual behavior
when the app is been launch click on the red plus button, using Manuel city chooser it crash.

#### How to reproduce
- Launch the app.
- Click on the red plus button and use Manuel city chooser
- Then select country 

* Browser/App version: 3.7
* Operating system: Android version 7.0

#### Recording Of The Bug
https://youtu.be/zzDhKm2jb9g

title: The app crashes when clicking on the "(+)" feature and while searching for "Auto Location"
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
#### Expected behavior
when accessing feature (+) and while searching for "Auto Location", it should not return to home page without command.


#### Actual behavior
When accessing the (+) and while searching for "Auto Location" feature in the app and once inside the feature the app suddenly returns to the home page automatically. I have accessed and tried to repeat it, but the error persists.

#### How to reproduce
1. Install the application.
2. Open the app.
3. Click on the feature (+) in the app and click on location search feature select the location you want to access, then you will see the application will automatically return to the home page.

----
- Device: Redmi Note 5A
- Operating system: 7.1.2 N2GHz
- (CPU: Octa-core Max 1.40 GHz, RAM: 3 GB)

Application Version: 
3.6.5

#### Recording Of The Bug

https://youtu.be/mhwIx_Nprh4

title: When accessing the feature and turning the rotation into landscape mode, the app returns to the home page
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
#### Expected behavior
when accessing the feature and turning the rotation into landscape mode, it should not return to the home page without a command.

#### Actual behavior
When accessing some features in the app and after inside the feature, I change the rotation to landscape mode, the app suddenly returns to the home page automatically. I have accessed all the features and tried to change the rotation from portrait to landscape mode, but the error persists.

#### How to reproduce
1. Install the application
2. Open the app
3. Click on one of the in-app features, once inside the feature then change the rotation to landscape mode, **then you will see the app will automatically return to the home page**

----
- Device: Xiaomi Redmi 4X
- Operating system: Marshmallow, 6.0.1 mmb29m (CPU: Octa-core Max 1.9 GHz, RAM: 2 GB)
- Application Version: 3.7

#### Recording Of The Bug
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yi5K3PKDJOY

title: Crash app when accessing Restore / Backup feature
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
#### Expected behavior
Supposedly, the Backup / Restore feature works normally and does not cause crashes in the application.

#### Actual behavior
When I click on the Backup / Restore feature in the settings feature, the Application stops automatically.

#### How to reproduce

1. Get the Prayer Times app on F-Droid
2. After you successfully install the app, Open the app.
3. Enter the settings menu
4. Click the Restore / Backup feature, then the app will stop.

***
***

* Browser : Redmi Note 5A
* System Operating : 7.1.0 Nougat
* App Version : 3.7

#### Recording Of The Bug
https://youtu.be/PhQznzeUjSs

title: Crash app when setting color in "dhikr feature"
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
#### Expected behavior
Supposedly, the color setting inside the "Dhizkr feature" works normally and does not cause the application to stop.

#### Actual behavior
When I enter "Dhikr feature" and change the color settings, Application stops automatically.

#### How to reproduce
You can get this app in F-droid. After successfully install the application, Steps you should do:

1. Open and run the app.
2. Open "Dzhikr feature".
3. Click on the color settings provided in the "dhikr feature".
4. Then the app will stop.

***
***

* Browser : Redmi Note 5A

title: The app crashes and exits by itself when changing to landscape mode in the "Prayer Compass" feature
body:
#### Expected behavior
Supposedly, when accessing the "Compass Prayer" feature in landscape mode there is no error.


#### Actual behavior
First of all, I access the "Compass Prayer" feature, then I change the rotation from portrait to landscape mode, suddenly the app will return to the home page and will crash and exit by itself.


#### How to reproduce
1. Install the application
2. Open the app
3. Go to "Prayer Compass" feature
4. Next turn the screen rotation into landscape mode, then you will find the error as I experienced.

----
- Device: Xiaomi Redmi 4X
- Operating system: Marshmallow, 6.0.1 mmb29m (CPU: Octa-core Max 1.9 GHz, RAM: 2 GB)
- Application Version: 3.7

#### Recording Of The Bug
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CE-fJUuJ8tM

title: Prayer Times App crashes when trying to export a prayer time
body:
#### Expected behavior When trying to export a prayer time either as CSV or PDF without selecting or changing the date, I expected the app to export the prayer time when I click on done or present a toast or dialog asking me to select the date before clicking on done. #### Actual behavior When I clicked on Export, and choose either CSV or PDF and clicked on Done without changing or selecting the date, the app crashes. #### How to reproduce - Download the Prayer Times app - Launch the app - At the Prayer Time Activity,click on the Fab icon to add a prayer time - After adding a prayer time,from the list of prayer times selcect a prayer time - At the prayer times item Activity click on the menu icon after notification icon to see the drop down options - Click on export - Click on CSV or PDF - From the date selection dialog click on done without changing the date - The app crashes and Exit * Version: Prayer Times version 3.6.5 * Operating system: Infinix hot:Android Kitkat #### Recording Of The Bug https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zsk4IM91Omc
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

title: App returns back to home page  while selecting some options and viewing in landscape and vice versa.
body:
#### Expected behavior While options are selected and viewed on landscape the display page should remain the same #### Actual behavior When view on landscape then turned to portrait display page returns to home menu and vise versa #### How to reproduce Download prayer times on fdriod. Open app, then select options from the slide. Then change device view, app will return current page to home page. * Application: prayer times. Version3.7 * Operating system: andriod 7.0 nougat tecno wx3p #### Recording Of The Bug ![videotogif_2018.03.16_03.14.45.gif](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1521594448/ughh16qoc7i27itcnxex.gif)

title: Reset option crashes app after been selected.
body:
#### Expected behavior After making several counts, then selecting the reset option should clear all previous counts to default. #### Actual behavior After making counts then clicking on the reset option app crashes #### How to reproduce Download prayer times application on fdriod. Open app, then from the slide on the menu option select ''dhikr''. Make several counts on the round counter displayed on the screen, then click on the reset option below it by the left. App crashes instantly. * Application: prayer times, version 3.7, version 3.7. Fdriod * Operating system: andriod 7.0 nougat. Tecno wx3p #### Recording Of The Bug ![videotogif_2018.03.14_22.54.30.gif](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1521065568/keltugasd2i904kpv20s.gif)

title: Changing prayer times
body: My location is set to Hendricks County in Avon, IN, USA. I've noticed that the time for maghrib changes. If I open the app after clearing the cache and force stopping, the time is correct, but if I exit the app and open again without clearing the cache and stopping the app, the time is off by about half an hour. I haven't been able to verify this for other prayer times. I'm running Lineage OS 14.1 on a Nexus 6. If you require any further information, please let me know. Thank you.

title: some settings with long description are not readable and not understandable
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
Hi,
some settings/options with long description are not readable and not understandable, because they end suddenly with "...". (for example in german language, i think in other language too)
For long descriptions its better to add a new line, for better readability and understandabilty!

Thank you very much, Great App !!

Best regards

title: Please provide changelog in a web readable format
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: Currently the change log is provided in the code in HTML format. Yet it is not readable on the web, since github only views it only in raw format showing the HTML tags. Someone from the FDroid project told me that there are some services that render html from github repo content, but they all seem to need some setup.

title: morroco prayertimes - monthly view - not automaticly actualized
body:
Hi,
for my last question about morroco monthly view you wrote me:
...If you press refresh from the menu, it will be synced, otherwise it will just download the new times, if the data comes to the end...
I pressed refresh and it worked.

Also you wrote: ...otherwise it will just download the new times, if the data comes to the end...
I understand that your app will automatic download the new times, if the data comes to the end.

The morroco prayertimes are displayed till 30.03.2017.
At 01.04.2017 the morroco prayertimes dates are not automaticly actualized.
Please correct it for your next version. (i used your last fdroid version)

Best regards

title: marocain cityname (only habous.gov.ma) not displayed in app, something wrong
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
1. i coosed a marocain city (habous.gov.ma) in your prayertime app. The cityname was displayed.
2. i updated the app to vers. 3.6.3
3. i searched for another marocain city. I choosed the marocain city(habous.gov.ma). After choosing, as a result the choosed city(habous.gov.ma) is displayed 3 times. One is displayed with the city name, the two other results are without name(only the name habous.gov.ma is displayed).
4. I choosed the city(habous.gov.ma) with name. The cityname was not displayed. (in the city overview i find the same city 3 times. One is displayed with name, the two other without name.
5. i deleted all cities in the app.
6. i search for my first marocain city (habous.gov.ma), i found the city and choosed it. As a result the choosed city(habous.gov.ma) is displayed 2 times, but all without names. I choosed one of them, but both are displayed without names.
7. reboot with the same result.
8. I added  a marocain city(diyanet.gov.tr) it's working. The problem is only with cities from habous.gov.ma
9. uninstall and new install the same result.
remark: if i delete the first unnamed city, the message "do you want to delete the city "null"? If i delete the first unnamed city. The second unnamed city is suddenly named as CSV Kenitra. I klicked on it, the city name is displayed, but all prayertimes are 00:00
---------------------reproducing the mistake------------------------------
10. i use a backup from other phone and then it's working.
11. after restore i have one marocain city(habous.gov.ma) in the app.
12. i add the second one(habous.gov.ma) and then the problem repeats. After adding the second city i see 2 new entries without display the cityname, i see only habous.gov.ma in the two entries.

Please can you solve the problem.
Best regards

title: Android automatic refactor - Recycle
body:
Hi,

I am developing a tool to automatically refactor Android applications with the goal of improving energy efficiency.
This pull request has the changes generated while applying the rule "Recycle".

Some resources (e.g., ```Cursor``` instances) should be closed when they are no longer necessary. 

I have made a previous validation of the changes and they seem correct.
Please consider them and let me know if you agree with them.

Best,
Luis

title: 2nd Suggestion: option to Stop Athan by turning the device screen face down
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
you told me:
...pressing the power button or swiping the notification will stop Athan.
you can do that faster than turning you phone and you won't do it by accident, like when turning the device screen down, so i think, thats enough...

If you use a handy bag, it's not so fast. And it's a differentiation of the type of bag you use.
1. I must turn the handy to the right position or side, open the handy bag, and than swipe the notification.
2. If i hear suddenly the athan, i must search the power button with my fingers.
I must turn the handy to the right side or position, and then find the power button with my fingers and i take care, not to press the false button.(loudness-button)

It's easier, if you integrate a option to stop athan by turning the device screen face down for people who need this.
You do not need to put your handy to the right position. You don't think where is the power button and to search the button with your fingers.

You turn the handy screen face down. That's all.

Best regards

Please test and correct the problem.
Best regards

title: Importing and then re-exporting the calculation to a .csv file
body:
Hi Metin,

Job well done on the application.
makes a good learning curve and well documented though I would remove some hardcoded colors and names and move them into strings.

All in All ! (A+)
Now, was wondering if it's possible to use the selected city to populate the calculated calendar as it is happening now and generate a formatted .csv file would serve the purpose of calculation exchange into Digital Signage applications for instance

http://www.fazilettakvimi.com/tr/namaz_vakitleri.html
They already provide the export feature but would be nice to trigger it from the Mobile application instead

Most Digital Signage apps would read the below format

Date;Fajr;Shuruq;Dhuhr;Asr;Maghrib;Isha'a
